,2016-02-25 11:30:39,Packshots_Stax-Sour Cream.jpg,#18A556,Background - Product - STAX Sour Cream.png,Made in Canada | Gluten Free ,,White,STAX 5,0, 4771,LAY'S®,LAY'S CLASSIC® Potato Chips,https://www.lays.ca/products/lays-classic® potato-chips,30015464_Lay%27s_Classic_235g.png,

Always fresh tasting, crispy and delicious, each bag of Lay’s Classic® potato chips is made with specially selected potatoes and to the highest quality standards. Crispy and light tasting, Lay’s Classic® potato chips were designed to put a smile on everyone’s face, which makes them the perfect snack to share. Whether you keep a bag in your desk to complement your chicken salad sandwich at lunchtime or grab a bag to share at your next social occasion, Lay’s Classic® chips will surely brighten your day! It’s the ‘Classic’ snack tradition Canadians love!

","Specially selected potatoes, vegetable oil, salt.",,Amount per 50 g serving (36 chips),"- Calories

,2016-02-25 9:47:44,Packshots_Classic.jpg,#F8CE41,Background - Product - Classic.png,Made in Canada | Gluten Free | Kosher | No artifical flavours | No artifical colours | ,,Black,LAY'S 1,0, 4772,LAY'S®,LAY'S® Ketchup Flavoured Potato Chips,https://www.lays.ca/products/lays® ketchup-potato-chips,30015466_Lays_Ketchup_235g.png,

Canadians know a thing or two about great taste and we love our Ketchup! That’s why the combination of Lay’s® fresh taste and tangy tomato seasoning has become a Canadian taste tradition. Serve a bowl at your next get-together to delight family and friends with the crunchy, savoury flavour that is loved by everyone!

","Specially selected potatoes, vegetable oil, seasoning (sugar, salt, monosodium glutamate, lactose, acetic acid, sodium acetate, dehydrated vegetable powder [tomato, garlic, onion], corn maltodextrin, dextrose, flavour and artificial flavour, citric acid, malic acid, colour, spice, disodium inosinate, disodium guanylate).",Contains milk ingredients.,Amount per 50 g serving (27 chips),"- Calories

,2016-02-25 9:51:03,Packshots_Ketchup.jpg,#B22F29,Background - Product - Ketchup.png,Made in Canada | Gluten Free | Kosher Dairy,,White,LAY'S 3,0, 4775,LAY'S®,LAY'S® Bar•B•Q Flavoured Potato Chips,https://www.lays.ca/products/lays® bar•b•q-potato-chips,30015463_Lay%27s_BBQ_235g.png,

With a secret blend of flavourful barbeque spices and famous fresh taste, Lay’s® Bar•B•Q flavoured potato chips are a tasty tribute to the Canadian backyard grilling tradition! These crispy chips have a sweet and smoky flavour that’s both fresh and inviting whether you savour the flavour as a side to burgers hot off the grill, or embrace spontaneity by crumbling them into a chicken salad to add some crunch and fun.

The sweet and smoky taste of Lay’s® Bar•B•Q flavoured potato chips offers the perfect, iconic flavour to satisfy all your snacking needs.

","Specially selected potatoes, vegetable oil, seasoning (sugar, salt, dextrose, molasses, onion powder, brown sugar, monosodium glutamate, malted barley flour, torula yeast, spices, wheat starch, garlic powder, natural flavours [contains mustard], paprika extract, sulphites).","Contains barley, wheat, mustard and sulphite ingredients.",Amount per 50 g serving (27 chips),"- Calories

Why are Lay’s® Dill Pickle flavoured potato chips a true taste tradition? Because Canadians love the tangy taste of Dill Pickle and the fresh taste of Lay’s® potato chips! Your taste buds will dance for the undeniably delightful and refreshing hint of dill hidden in every crunchy bite. It’s a ‘Dill-icious’ flavour Canadians love!

,Specially selected potatoes, vegetable oil, seasoning (corn maltodextrin, sodium acetate, acetic acid, salt, natural flavours, monosodium glutamate, potassium chloride, dill, garlic powder, modified corn starch, lactose, calcium lactate).",Contains milk ingredients.,Amount per 50 g serving (27 chips),"- Calories

Inspired by the beauty, music and culture of Cape Breton Island, Lay’s® Sea Salt & Pepper potato chips are seasoned with sea salt and black pepper for a Maritime tradition you’ll never forget. So kick back and embrace the moment with a crisp and crunchy delightfully balanced blend of salt and pepper.

NEW Lay’s® Cheddar Jalapeño flavour potato chips are here to stay! These deliciously distracting chips combine the comforting taste of cheddar with a subtle spice of jalapeño, all perfectly seasoned on Canada’s favourite potato chip brand!

If you are looking for a great-tasting potato chip with less salt, try Lay’s® Lightly Salted potato chips - made with 50% less sodium than Lay’s Classic® potato chips! This fun snack lets you enjoy lightly salted potato chips without compromising on taste . Made from the simple ingredients of potatoes, vegetable oil and salt, Lay’s® Lightly Salted potato chips are crispy and light tasting, giving you a great treat you can feel good about serving at any time of day. Whether you want chips to complement your lunch or as a late afternoon break, Lay’s® Lightly Salted potato chips, provide you with the perfect way to brighten your day!

","Specially selected potatoes, vegetable oil.",,Amount per 50 g serving (36 chips),"- Calories

,2016-02-25 11:19:39,Packshots_LS-WAVY.jpg,#AEE4FC,Background - Product Lightly Salted - All.png,Made in Canada | Gluten Free | Kosher | No artifical flavours | No artifical colours ,,Black,Lightly 3,0, 6551,LAY'S® Variety Packs,Frito-Lay® Variety Pack LAY'S® Mix,https://www.lays.ca/products/frito-lay®-variety-pack-lay’s®-mix,lays-mix.png,

Mix it up with Frito-Lay® Variety packs! Everyone loves something different, that’s why we created Frito-Lay® Variety Packs where you can find something for everyone’s snacking needs. 

Try the Lay’s® Mix that provides your family with Lay’s® flavours for a quick and flavourful snacking solution. This pack includes Lay’s® Classic, Lay’s® Bar-B-Q, Lay’s® Ketchup, and Lay’s® Salt & Vinegar potato chips. Get 20 units of your favourite Lay’s® flavours in portable bags that are perfect for on-the-go snacking! Plus our outer packaging has a cinch handle making the entire pack easy to carry and store. 

Frito-Lay Variety packs are perfect for many occasions. Stock up for after-school snacks, sporting events, road trips and for snacking on the go.

",,,,,2019-07-29 11:08:05,Packshots_Variety-Pack-Lays.jpg,#EB893C,Background - Product - Variety Pack Lays Mix.png,Made in Canada,,White,Variety 1,0,

4770,WAVY LAY'S®,WAVY LAY'S® Original Potato Chips,https://www.lays.ca/products/wavy-lays® original-potato-chips,30015509_LaysWavyOriginal_235g.png,"

Wavy Lay’s® potato chips have all the crispy, fresh taste made famous by Lay’s® potato chips, with a Wavy crunch all their own. They feature delicate and crispy ridges, making them ideal for dipping. Wavy Lay’s® Original potato chips are made with only three ingredients: potatoes, vegetable oil and salt. As a result, the classic, savoury potato chip flavour shines through and highlights the flavour of dips. Perfect at parties, Wavy Lay’s® potato chips are great for dipping; or enjoyed on their own ! scoop up some chips and keep the party hopping!

","Specially selected potatoes, vegetable oil, salt.",,Amount per 50 g serving (19 chips),"- Calories
